text: A.D. Almería is a former football club which played in Spain. == Former position == *1978/79 : Segunda División - 1st *1979/80 : La Liga - 10th *1980/81 : La Liga - 18th *1981/82 : Segunda División - 18th Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Almería Category:1971 establishments in Europe Category:1970s establishments in Spain
title: AD Almería
